citations.narrative:
A board was broken and jagged inside of the enclosure for the sheep and goats. This was at a level within the animals
reach and could allow the animals to possibly become injured. Outdoor animal facilities need to be maintained in good
repair in order to protect the animals and prevent them from injury. The licensee needs to correct this issue.
*********Correct by October 13, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
A board was broken and jagged inside of the enclosure for the sheep and goats. This was at a level within the animals 
reach and could allow the animals to possibly become injured. Outdoor animal facilities need to be maintained in good 
repair in order to protect the animals and prevent them from injury. The licensee needs to correct this issue.  
*********Correct by October 13, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
